meanings.definition: A straight line from the center to the circumference of a circle or sphere.
meanings.sent1: The radiuses of the circle were all equal in length.
meanings.sent2: She measured the radiuses of the spheres in geometry class.
meanings.sent3: The radiuses of the circle decided to have a race to the circumference.
meanings.sent4: His kindness extended to the radiuses of his social circle.
meanings.sent5: The bright red radiuses of the target made it easy to aim at.
